tool_description: Creates melodic lines that harmonize with provided chord progressions, considering range, rhythm, and musical style.

chord_progression.description: Array of chord symbols to harmonize with

rhythm_style.description: Rhythm approach: legato, staccato, syncopated, balanced

error_messages: Empty chord progression: Provide at least one chord
Invalid octave range format: Use format like 3-4 or 4-6
Invalid note density: Choose sparse, medium, or dense
Invalid rhythm style: Choose legato, staccato, syncopated, or balanced
Invalid bars per chord: Must be 1-4
usage: Provide chord progression and key, optionally specify octave range, note density, rhythm style, and bars per chord. Returns MIDI note data with timing.

notes.description: Array of note names with octave (e.g., C4, E4, G4)

start_times.description: Start time for each note in beats
